radialcolordialog

Class ColorTuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • radialcolordialog.ColorTuple

  • public class ColorTuple
extends java.lang.Object
    Color Tuple describes either a RGB Color or HSB Color with an Alpha channel. The color is described as ABCD for: RGBA ~ Red, Green, Blue, Alpha or HSBA Hue, Saturation, Brightness, Alpha.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ColorTuple()
      Basic constructor.
      ColorTuple(float a, float b, float c)
      Constructor with values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorTuple

        public ColorTuple()
        Basic constructor. The values are 0, and it is in RGB mode.

      • ColorTuple

        public ColorTuple(float a,
                  float b,
                  float c)
        Constructor with values. The values should be in the range of 0.0 to 1.0.
        Parameters:
        a - The a value (0.0 to 1.0).
        b - The b value (0.0 to 1.0).
        c - The c value (0.0 to 1.0).

      • getChannelAsInt

        public int getChannelAsInt(Channel channel,
                           int range)
        Get a channel value converted to an integer from the provided range (channel * range).
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel value to use as a base value.
        range - The range to scale the channel by.
        Returns:
        The integer value of the channel.

      • getRGB

        public java.awt.Color getRGB()
        Get a Color from this tuple treating the values as R,G,B (A,B,C).
        Returns:
        The color generated from the values as R,G,B.

      • getHSB

        public java.awt.Color getHSB()
        Get a color from this tuple treating the values as H,S,B (A,B,C);
        Returns:
        The color generated from the values as H,S,B.

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor(TupleType type)
        Get the standard color from the ColorTuple. This converts the values to an RGB color with the default alpha value.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of tuple to use as basis for conversion (RGB or HSB)
        Returns:
        The color converted from the tuple.
